meanings.definition: In a corresponding manner or way.
meanings.sent1: She waved back correspondingly when he greeted her.
meanings.sent2: The twins dressed correspondingly for the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed correspondingly to the tune of the music.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled correspondingly to the beat of the night.
meanings.sent5: His footsteps echoed correspondingly in the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: In a way that is similar or equivalent to something else.
meanings.sent1: The prices of the two items were correspondingly high.
meanings.sent2: Her grades improved correspondingly with her study efforts.
meanings.sent3: The two friends laughed correspondingly at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the flowers changed correspondingly with the seasons.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room grew correspondingly with each passing minute.
